name: Box Bandits!
description:
Box Bandits was made in just under 3 hours for the 47th Trijam GameJam (only had 2 mins 54 secs to spare!)

Playing as Sheriff Spheriff, you are tasked to defeat the evil Box Bandits who have invaded the endless plain of existence .

Bugs are everywhere, but eh 

Made using:

  • Unity
  • PiskelApp.com
  • GIMP
  • SoundTrap.com
